propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each component slot.
propDescriptions.displayStaticWrapperAs: Force static wrapper inner components to be rendered in mobile or desktop mode.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.ActionBar: The action bar placed bellow picker views.
slotDescriptions.PaperContent: The content of the Paper wrapping views.
